title: 576. Lance Zierlein on Scouting College Opt Outs
itunes:title: 576. Lance Zierlein on Scouting College Opt Outs
description:
Bucky Brooks is back with a new episode with special guest Lance Zierlein. To start off, the guys react to 49ers tight end George Kittle's contract extension (:39) and defensive end Everson Griffen signing with the Cowboys (4:30). After, the pair look at Jadeveon Clowney being a free agent (9:13). Next, the duo react to episode 1 of Hard Knocks and discuss how teams are adjusting to the pandemic during training camp (13:28). Then, the guys discuss the differences and challenges of scouting college opt outs and also touch on the Big Ten and Pac-12 postponing fall college football (16:27). To wrap up the show, Bucky and Lance talk about some of the best college QBs and their skill sets (28:35).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
